ygData.subject: Re: Where can I find PP?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to ... can do ... factions a ... Anyone ... As a level 13 enchanter, I just completed the stein of Moggok quest for the first time last night.  My faction
ygData.messageBody:
--- In eqenchanters@egroups.com, Mark Rafn <dagon@d...> wrote:
> On Wed, 24 May 2000 koosh@t... wrote:
>
> > I was wondering where an enchater that is Highelven, find the PP
to
> > raise her jewlery skill.


>
> The normal answer for a poor enchanter is "Stein of Moggok". You
can do
> it in under 4 hours (less if you know someone who teleports), and it
> should net you 200pp or so. Someone told me they'd changed the
factions a
> few patches ago, so you can't do it until you get Illusion:Ogre.
Anyone
> have current info on whether a L12 can still do this quest?
>


As a level 13 enchanter, I just completed the stein of Moggok quest
for the first time last night. My faction with Clurg was indifferent
with Dark Elf illusion and alliance. That was still good enough to
get the stein.

Traelia, level 13 High Elf Enchanter
Luclin
